content: The great question that has never been answered, and which I have not yet been able to answer, despite my thirty years of research into the feminine soul, is "What does a woman want?"
translations: ita:La grande domanda che non ha mai avuto risposta, e alla quale non sono ancora stato in grado di rispondere, malgrado i m
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
